data.text:
Armed with her prized daï-jo fighting stick and her trusty camera, Jade’s adventure returns in Beyond Good & Evil’s 20th anniversary special edition.

Find out more about Jade’s childhood!

Join us for a captivating conversation on Discord! (Join us!)

We’re looking forward for your comments on Youtube! Check out our videos!

Beyond Good & Evil – 20th Anniversary Edition, the action and adventure game developed by Virtuos and Ubisoft Montpellier and published by Ubisoft, arrives today (June 25, 2024) on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox X and S Series, Xbox One, Microsoft Windows.

The game was released in 2003, and as reporter Jade, we will enter the wonderful world of Hillys to investigate the mysterious DomZ alien attacks and spend time with colorful characters such as her step-uncle Pey’j and the brave Double H.

The 20th anniversary special edition features improved graphics and controls, performance up to 4K and 60fps, updated sounds and 15 new soundtracks, as well as auto-save, cross-save and scene traversal

It will also offer players a unique experience in the new Speedrun Mode. You will not be allowed to save the game in this mode! More than 20 new achievements have also been added to the game.

In the game, you will be able to freely explore the Hillys on the adventure of Daï-jo and his trusty camera Jade, fight creatures both big and small, infiltrate dangerous areas, solve complex puzzles, play mini games, compete against the best Hovercraft pilots and photograph the whole experience.

CONTENTS

How much is Beyond Good & Evil – 20th Anniversary Edition?

This new version, where you can learn more about Jade’s childhood, is available on PC from $16 on Steam. The game is still $19.00 on PlayStation.

Is Beyond Good & Evil Turkish?

Beyond Good & Evil – 20th Anniversary Edition supports 13 different languages. But it has no Turkish subtitle and interface support.

Beyond Good & Evil system requirements

As we mentioned above, you can experience this classic game on your next-generation devices with 4K support and up to 60 fps performance.

Beyond Good & Evil minimum system requirements

The game requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Operating System: Windows 10 (64 bit only)

Processor: Intel Core i5-4460, AMD Ryzen3 1200

Memory: 8 GB OF RAM

Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 (4GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT (4GB VRAM)

DirectX: Version 11

Storage: 20 GB of available space

Beyond Good & Evil recommended system requirements

The game requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Operating System: Windows 10 (64 bit only), Windows 11 (64 bit only)

Processor: Intel Core i7-6700, AMD Ryzen5 1400

Memory: 8 GB OF RAM

Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 (4GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT (4GB VRAM)

DirectX: Version 11

Storage: 20 GB of available space
